snippet.title: please - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
You are the repair person. You fix things. You keep things running. You do what you're told. We asked you so nicely. 

Made during the month of June 2019 for the Spooky PS1 Game Jam, 'please' is a short interactive experience that is available now on both itch.io and Gamejolt.

Itchio :
https://somewhat.itch.io/please

Gamejolt :
https://gamejolt.com/games/please_/421984
